name: Brass Bathroom Sink Drain Pipe Kit,Bathroom Sink Drain kit with pop-up Stopper，sink drain kit，Flexible Sink Drain Pipe P-Trap,Suitable for Overflow Outlet and No Overflow Outle
short_description: 【Incredibly Practical】The brass pop-up drain, with its detachable basket stopper, is incredibly practical. The flexible P-type drain pipe that comes with it; it made installation a breeze even in a tight spot. Everything feels well-made and durable, and the pop-up function works smoothly. If you're looking for an efficient and easy-to-install drain for your bathroom sink, this one is a winner.

【High Quality Leak Proof Design】 The sink drain kit includes four rubber leak proof gaskets, suitable for sink holes of 1.65-2.35 inches. The holes are equipped with double-sided waterproof gaskets to prevent water leakage and create a comfortable user experience.

【Deodorization and Backflow Prevention】 The transparent anti reflux kit and S-shaped water seal can achieve dual anti odor reflux. And it is easy to observe the blockage situation, and can be cleaned or replaced in a timely manner.

【Easy Installation】The sink drain kit adopts a threaded and card sleeve connection method, making installation and replacement simple and convenient, without the need for any tools, relying on your diligent hands to achieve easy operation.

【Space Compatibility】 The dual interface kit provides you with dual options for horizontal and vertical drainage. The drain direction can be adjusted 360 ° by rotating the kit to meet the changing drain space.
【Materials】 The sink drain kit includes high-quality brass drain kit, PP drain plastic pipe, and bouncing drain plug; Moisture proof, corrosion-resistant, rust proof.
【About installation and use】 The product packaging contains detailed installation instructions, making it easy to solve installation problems

name: iFealClear Bathroom Sink Drain Kit, Flexible P-Trap Drain Pipe with Pop Up Stopper, Expandable Bathroom Sink Pipe Replacement with 2 Adapters, Fits 1-1/4'', 1-1/2'', 2" Holes, Hair Catcher, Chrome
short_description: Universal Compatibility: This bathroom sink drain pipe kit is designed to fit 1-1/4", 1-1/2" and 2" bathroom drain holes, and 1.5"-2" sink holes, making it compatible with a wide range of sinks. The flexible drain pipe can expand and adjust effortlessly from 6.7" to 37". Simply measure the diameter of your sink hole and drain hole before purchasing

3-in-1 Bathroom Sink Drain Strainer Kit: Comes with drain stopper, P-trap Tubing and odor catcher. Anti-clogging and anti-odor. The p-trap bathroom sink with drain strainer features an anti-clogging basket filter, conveniently collecting hair and fines to prevent clogs. The inner part includes an anti-odor core for effective odor blocking and deodorization

Leak-Proof Design for Peace of Mind: We've incorporated a thickened silica-gel gasket at the junction of the drain plug and drainer to prevent leaks. Simply ensure the gaskets are in the correct position, and you can rest assured that your bathroom sink will be leak-free

Built to Last with Premium Materials: iFealClear sink pipe replacement kit is constructed using high-quality engineering polypropylene plastic. A black finish and strong ABS surface pop-up drain stopper can resist daily scratches, corrosion, and discoloration. Specifically designed to withstand extreme water temperatures, resist alkali, and prevent cracking. This ensures long-lasting durability and reliable performance

Effortless Installation, No Tools Required: This P-trap sink drain pipe tubing is designed for easy installation, even for those who are not experienced with plumbing. The simple construction and thickened, extended nut allow you to install the drain pipe with your bare hands, making it a quick and easy process

name: KAIYING Pop Up Drain, Bathroom Sink Drain Stopper with Overflow, Vessel Sink Drain Assembly with Detachable Basket Stopper, Anti-Explosion and Anti-Clogging Drain Strainer (Brushed Champagne Gold)
short_description: 【BUILD-IN ANTI-CLOGGING STRAINER】-Unlike regular push button drain, KAIYING drain stopper has a basket strainer inside that neatly collecting human or pet hairs and prevents it from clogging up, stuff will not get into the drain, such as jewelry, ring, dirt and so on. When it's time to clean up, simply take the strainer out, wipe it off and GO!

【MATERIAL】-Pop-up drain stopper, drain flange, threaded pipe are made from brass, tailpiece is constructed of thickened premium grade 304 stainless steel. All metal construction for maximum durability. Superior finish is corrosion & rust-resistant.

【EASY TO OPERATE】-Spring loaded push button does not require a lift rod. Simply push the drain cap down to close and seal, push it again to open and drain water. You can turn the upper cap counter-clockwise to unscrew and remove.

【EASY INSTALLATION】-Anyone can install a pop up drain due to its simple construction, no tools required, the thickened and extended nut allow it to be mounted by bare hand(Please refer to product pictures or instructions). Package includes drain housing with 2 gaskets, one pop up plug with the strainer basket, one brass nut and one plumber's tape.

【STANDARD 1 3/4" DRAIN OPENING】-Fits bathroom sink hole diameter 1.46-inch to 1.9-inch. MAX. sink thickness 1.97-inch. Tailpiece diameter: 1 1/4". Ideal for sinks with overflow (above-countertop vessel sink, vanity sink, etc.)

name: Moen Brass Widespread Bathroom Sink Faucet Rough-In Valve with Drain Assembly, Featuring M-PACT Technology, 9000
short_description: Not_applicable
Made in the USA
VALVE DESIGN MAY VARY: Both designs are compatible with Moen widespread faucets and have the same trusted quality and performance.
PEACE-OF-MIND: The bathroom sink valve is designed for hassle-free installation
LONGSTANDING FLEXIBILITY: Built on the Moen M-PACT common valve system, allowing you to update the faucet style in the future without replacing any plumbing
ORIGINAL EQUIPMENT MANUFACTURER: Authentic Moen replacement part
CONNECTION SIZE: 1/2-inch IPS connections

product_description: The Moen M-PACT technology makes changing the look of your faucet easier than ever. Designed for use with M-PACT widespread trim kits, this faucet valve installs with an easy snap thanks to its Duralock quick connect installation system. Once in place, the valve makes it possible to swap out different styles of decorative trim kits without ever touching the plumbing--simply untwist your current trim kit from the top and lock your new trim kit into place. Durable brass construction makes this valve a reliable addition to your plumbing system. Application- Three hole.
